title: Resonance
description: This ECHO TRILOGY novella takes place between ECHO PROPHECY and ECHO QUEEN (coming in September).**WARNING**This novella contains major spoilers from the novel, ECHO PROPHECY. http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00EIV14HKIt’s recommended that you read ECHO PROPHECY first, though it’s not required.DESCRIPTION BELOW*********A week has passed since the confrontation with Set. Lex and Marcus have been biding their time in Florence, waiting for Set to make a move. Just as they’re settling in to their new life together, an act of vandalism on one of Marcus’s most prized possessions reveals that their past—and future—is far more complex than they realized.
author: Lindsey Sparks
